data.message: Safety my you know what . You try to report a page like free items in Klamath falls . And Facebook only looks at original post and not the harassing and bullying comments on it . Then tell u they see nothing wrong and you can't write and tell Facebook on why you are reporting them ? And the administrator is one of the bullies . There page said no drama and treat others kind lol that's joke I was attacked for my opinion and made fun of because I'm disabled then after I left group 2 different guys pm me and called me names and said I couldn't hide . Well done Facebook way to protect people on your website !

replies.message: Hey there. We hear your frustration. Because of the diversity of our community, it's possible that something could be disagreeable or disturbing to you without meeting the criteria for being removed or blocked. For this reason, we offer personal controls over what you see, such as the ability to hide or quietly cut ties with people, Pages, or applications that offend you. Facebook also offers tools to help you deal with bullying and harassment. Learn more at: http://bit.ly/1SSQNEp. -Jordan
Before you give me your excuse on the subject you should go look at it your self .

Facebook is not looking at the comments !!!! Plus my own post I had to delete because they were so awful . And I'm not the only one complaining trying to get them removed . It's not just me they are harassing and bullying . You need to do something before this goes to far and someone gets hurt ! Haven't you watched that show called Facebook ruined my life ? No ones going to do anything before its to late ...

Or who asks for donations to get eyebrows tattooed on because they are to thin looking for them on a free items page . Then if you dare ask them to be kind and respectful they attack you the whole group of friends on there .
